headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Johnson Controls Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: Despite Johnson Controls’ outperformance relative to the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a cautiously optimistic outlook on the stock’s prospects.

headline: Bosch wants to grow significantly faster than the market in the heating, ventilation, and cooling sector
summary: Successfully completed: the largest acquisition in the company’s history Bosch successfully completes the largest acquisition in the company's history The Bosch Home Comfort division almost doubles in size to over 25,000 associates and more than $8.6 billion USD (eight billion euros) in sales. Bosch is thus significantly expanding its presence, especially in America and Asia, and becoming one of the largest suppliers in the market for heating, ventilation, and cooling of residential and small co

headline: Johnson Controls Completes Sale of Residential and Light Commercial HVAC Business
summary: Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE: JCI), a global leader for smart, safe, healthy and sustainable buildings, today announced it has completed the sale of its Residential and Light Commercial (R&LC) HVAC business in an all-cash transaction to the Bosch Group.

raw.headline: Johnson Controls Completes Sale of Residential and Light Commercial HVAC Business
